# Exploratory Analysis 
```{r Exploratory}
SOTFRaw$Sample.Date <- as.Date(SOTFRaw$Sample.Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")

class(SOTFRaw$Sample.Date)

SOTF_Childs <- SOTFRaw %>% filter(map_code %in% c("MA_CH09", "MA_CH08", "MA_CH07", "MA_CH06", "MA_CH05", "MA_CH04", "MA_CH03", "MA_CH02", "MA_CH01")) %>% select(Sample.ID, SiteName, Sample.Date, map_code, Latitude, Longitude, State.Region, NO3.N_µgL, NH4.N_µgL, TDN_µgL, PO4.P_µgL, SiO2_mgL, DOC_mgL, Water.temperature...F.)

na.omit(SOTF_Childs)

Childs_Plot_NO3 <- ggplot(SOTF_Childs, aes(x = Sample.Date, y = NO3.N_µgL, color = SiteName )) + geom_point()  + geom_smooth( se = FALSE) 

Childs_Plot_TDN <- ggplot(SOTF_Childs, aes(x = Sample.Date, y = TDN_µgL, color = SiteName)) + geom_point()  + geom_smooth(se = FALSE)

Childs_Plot_Temps <- ggplot(SOTF_Childs, aes(x = Sample.Date, y = Water.temperature...F., color = SiteName )) + geom_point()

print(Childs_Plot_NO3)
print(Childs_Plot_TDN)
print(Childs_Plot_Temps)
```
```{r spatial Analysis}
SOTF.sf <- SOTF_Childs %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c('Longitude','Latitude'), crs=4326)

class(SOTF.sf)
mapview(SOTF.sf)


```
